1. Transmission Line
2. Scattering Parameters
3. Microwave Active Components

Understanding the theory, applications, and implementation of microwave active circuits including the power amplifier, and oscillator etc.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Basic Concepts in RF Design and Wireless Standards
Week 3: Challenge of Power Amplifier (PA)
Week 4: Power Amplifier Circuits
Week 5: Transmitter (Tx)
Week 6: UE and BS Transmitter requirements
Week 7: GaN PAs for 5G systems
Week 8: Experiment: Load-Pull test theory and data processing (RF PA performance index and Load-Pull introduction)
Week 9: Experiment: Load-Pull test theory and data processing (PA Load-Pull simulation and Load-Pull measurement environment)
Week 10: Experiment: Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) model design and training (Concept of deep learning: neural network structure, loss function, and optimization)
Week 11: Experiment: Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) model design and training (GAN architecture and application, the roles and principles of generators and discriminators)
Week 12: Experiment: Data completing, performance analysis, and optimization (Comparison between GAN data completing and traditional interpolation methods)
Week 13: Experiment: Data completing, performance analysis, and optimization (Performance evaluation of GAN data completing)
Week 14: Project I: Power amplifier implementation
Week 15-17: Project II: Oscillator theory, design, simulation, and implementation
Week 18: Projects measurement and demo
scorePolicy:
實作一 Project I : 50%  (電路特性: 35% , 口試: 15%)
實作二 Project II : 50%  (電路特性: 35% , 口試: 15%)

需自備至少 Win10 以上和 16GB 記憶體的筆電.
課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）
